attributes.action: CO2 neutral option for all travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All fuel stations and air lines as an example MUST at the point of purchase of the 'product' OFFER the consumer the option to purchase some kind of 'offset' that will mean the product in general terms will be carbon neutral.  In a way an optional 'carbon neutrality tax'
What would I rather buy, travel insurance or something which means I won't add more CO2 to the environment?
